description:
Takatoshi Tsuda is now a second-year student at Ousai Academy. Amakusa Shino reprimands him for wearing his uniform sloppily, just like she had done the year previously.  Afternoon on April 1st, April Fools day, comes and we see the student council preforming their duties. Tokky hasn`t joined a club, so Mitsuba Mutsumi invites her to join the Judo club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mata Sakura no Ki no Shita de / Nemunemu no Kisetsu Poro / Neko o Kabutta Ookami
Under the Cherry Blossom Trees Again / A Season for Sleeping Plop / A Wolf in Cat`s Clothing
また桜の樹の下で / ねむねむの季節ポロッ / ねこをかぶったオオカミ
